MainPage.title: Welcome to my portfolio
MainPage.description: Portfolio website of Carles del Río Francés as Web and mobile developer

HeroSection.description: Let's get in touch. I'm available for freelance, full-time, part-time, contract and consulting opportunities.

AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.description: I am a front-end developer specializing in web and mobile applications. I am passionate about creating interactive and responsive experiences using technologies such as JavaScript, React, NextJS, React Native with Expo, Node.js, Express, Jira and Confluence, HTML, CSS and Git. I am always looking for new opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills.

webDevelopmentPortfolioWebsite.title: Web Development Portfolio Website
webDevelopmentPortfolioWebsite.description: A portfolio website highlighting my web and mobile development projects. Built with NextJS, React, TypeScript and TailwindCSS.

graphicDesignPortfolioWebsite.title: Graphic Design Portfolio Website
graphicDesignPortfolioWebsite.description: A portfolio website displaying my graphic design projects. Built with React, Express and CSS3.

myPensionWebApp.title: My Pension Web App
myPensionWebApp.description: A web application and client portal for managing pension plans. Built with NodeJS, React, Redux, Express, Sass, Bootstrap and MySQL.

myPensionMobileApp.title: My Pension Mobile App
myPensionMobileApp.description: A mobile app for managing pension plans in Germany. NodeJS, React Native, Expo, Sass, MySQL.

remoryoMobileApp.title: Remoryo Mobile App
remoryoMobileApp.description: A mobile app designed to enhance communication with elderly loved ones by generating and sending monthly printed magazines. Built with React-Native, Expo, styled-components, Zustand, PuppeteerHTMLPDF, MySQL, Stripe and push notifications.

leoLeo.title: Leo, leo... ¿Qué lees? (PWA)
leoLeo.description: A web application designed to manage participants and organize a yearly Spanish reading contest for German schools. Since 2019. React, Express, CSS3, MongoDB. Admin panel.

theCirculArtStatistics.title: The CirculArt Statistics
theCirculArtStatistics.description: An engaging web application designed to visualize client statistics for theCirculArt, a company that provides innovative circular economy solutions for enterprises in the financial sector.

sweetTextAIGenerator.title: Sweet Text AI Generator
sweetTextAIGenerator.description: A web application designed to generate sweet text messages using AI. React, Express, CSS3, chat-GPT3.

foodOrderingAndDeliveryApp.title: Food Ordering and Delivery App
foodOrderingAndDeliveryApp.description: A mobile app designed to order and deliver food, based on the NotJustDev tutorial by Vadim Savin. React Native, Expo, Supabase, stripe, push-notifications.

apiRESTful.title: API RESTful
apiRESTful.description: A robust and scalable RESTful API designed to provide seamless integration and efficient data management for a variety of services. Built with Node.js, Express and MongoDB. It ensures high performance and reliability.

mosaic.title: Mosaic.photography (PWA)
mosaic.description: Design and development of a full-stack web and PWA application (Next.js 15+, TypeScript, CSS3, Supabase, AWS S3 with CloudFront CDN and Vercel for deployment). Mosaic is a curated gallery showcasing the public domain works of iconic nude photographers, designed with a focus on web performance and SEO optimization (optimized for Google Core Web Vitals and search engine rankings) to ensure fast load times and high search engine visibility.

ContactSection.title: Let's connect
ContactSection.subject: Subject
ContactSection.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

education.title: Education
education.advancedJs: Advanced programming with JavaScript and ECMAScript

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.advancedJs: Advanced programming with JavaScript and ECMAScript

Footer.design: Designed and developed by Carles del Río Francés
Footer.check-crix: Check out my projects as a graphic designer on
Footer.no-cookies: This website does not use cookies or similar tracking technologies.
